alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:46PM CDT until May 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Smith County in north central Kansas... Northern Osborne County in north central Kansas... Central Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located from 8 miles southwest of Kirwin, or 13 miles southeast of Phillipsburg, to Woodstone or northeast of Stockton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kirwin around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Alton, Cedar, Gaylord, Harlan, Portis and Downs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
